title: Kansas State Surgeon and Secretary of Kansas Department of Health and Environment Explains Why Vaping is a Threat to National Security
text:
KANSAS CITY, Kan., Oct. 7, 2019 /PRNewswire/ -- Doctors at The University of Kansas Cancer Center say there is no research showing how to kick the vaping habit. This news makes the epidemic even more frightening, especially for the parents of teens who struggle to sleep through the night without vaping. In the following video, The Kansas State Surgeon and Secretary of Kansas Department of Health and Environment explains why vaping is a threat to national security. Their comments and more in this special Bench to Bedside program.

You can find a shareable link of this Bench to Bedside on The University of Kansas Health System's YouTube.
